body: So I will archive this post when I get the answer. I was recording walls for the prep time but when the walls drop the player I was fighting combat logged so am I allowed to crop the footage to that point?
body_tagged: So I will archive this post when I get the answer. I was recording walls for the prep time but when the walls drop the player I was fighting combat logged so am I allowed to crop the footage to that point?
title: I need help with a report.

replies.body: you should be able to crop but I would leave a 5 second gap before he combat logged
replies.body_tagged: you should be able to crop but I would leave a 5 second gap before he combat logged

replies.body: It doesn't have to be a 5 second gap
replies.body_tagged: It doesn't have to be a 5 second gap

replies.body: yeah thats fine.. they don't need to see the unnecessary bits.
replies.body_tagged: yeah thats fine.. they don't need to see the unnecessary bits.

replies.body:
If you'd like, it's totally fine to post the full video on a report, and you could tell us to skip to which part (: 

EX) Skip to 0:45 for the Combat Log. (;
replies.body_tagged:
If you'd like, it's totally fine to post the full video on a report, and you could tell us to skip to which part (:
